name: stub
entryPoint: require 'webrick'; class S < WEBrick::HTTPServlet::AbstractServlet; def do_GET(req,res); res.status = 200; res.content_type = 'text/plain'; app = ENV['APP_NAME']; res.body = 'hello from ' + app; end; end; server = WEBrick::HTTPServer.new(Port: 8080); server.mount('/', S); server.start
